languages.text: After using a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the wearer immediately uses War Hymn or Furious Recital (regardless of its {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}). Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: For the wielder able to use the War Hymn ability, it costs −1 AP less. After using a heroic act, the wielder can immedialtely use War Hymn (regardless of its cooldown). Base armour property: +15 Strength.

After using a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the wearer immediately uses War Hymn of Furious Recital (regardless of its {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}). Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

After using a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the wearer immediately uses War Hymn or Furious Recital (regardless of its {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}). Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

After using a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the wearer immediately uses War Hymn or Furious Recital (regardless of its {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}). Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

languages.text: Tras usar un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g}, el portador puede usar Himno de guerra o Recital furioso inmediatamente (independientemente del {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g}). Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}: +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.
languages.original_text: After using a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the wearer immediately uses War Hymn or Furious Recital (regardless of its {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}). Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Usar Himno de guerra cuesta −1 PA para el portador. Tras usar un acto heroico, el portador puede usar Himno de guerra inmediatamente (independientemente del tiempo de recuperación). Propiedad básica de armadura: +15 de Fuerza.

languages.text: 当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}之后，可以立刻使用战争礼赞或愤怒颂歌（无视该能力{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}）。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}特性：+15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。
languages.original_text: After using a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the wearer immediately uses War Hymn or Furious Recital (regardless of its {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}). Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}之后，可以立刻使用战争礼赞或愤怒颂歌（无视该能力{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}）。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}特性：+15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。

languages.text: Après avoir eu recours à un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g}, l'utilisateur peut immédiatement utiliser Hymne de guerre ou Récital furieux (indépendamment de son {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g}). Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.
languages.original_text: After using a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the wearer immediately uses War Hymn or Furious Recital (regardless of its {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}). Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hymne de Guerre coûte -1 PA de moins à l'utilisateur. Après avoir eu recours à un acte héroïque, celui-ci peut immédiatement utiliser Hymne de Guerre (indépendamment de son délai de récupération). Propriété d'armure de base : +15 de Force.

languages.text: Nach einer {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} setzt der Träger (unabhängig von der {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}) sofort Kriegshymne oder Inbrünstige Rezitation ein. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
languages.original_text: After using a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the wearer immediately uses War Hymn or Furious Recital (regardless of its {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}). Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Einsatz von Kriegshymne kostet den Träger −1 AP weniger. Nach der Nutzung einer Heldentat kann der Träger sofort Kriegshymne einsetzen (ungeachtet deren Abklingzeit). Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +15 Stärke.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}の使用後、戦の聖歌か怒りのリサイタルを直ちに使用する({g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}関係なく)。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}特性：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g} +15
languages.original_text: After using a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the wearer immediately uses War Hymn or Furious Recital (regardless of its {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}). Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦の聖歌を使用すると、使用者のAPを -1消費する。使用者は英雄的行為の使用後、戦の聖歌を直ちに使用する (クールダウンとは関係なく)。 基本アーマー特性：腕力 +15

languages.text: После совершения героического акта персонаж немедленно применяет Боевой гимн или Яростное выступление (даже если восстановление способности не завершено). Базовое свойство: +15 к Силе.
languages.original_text: After using a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the wearer immediately uses War Hymn or Furious Recital (regardless of its {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}). Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Использование Боевого гимна требует на 1 ОД меньше. После совершения героического акта персонаж может немедленно применить Боевой гимн (даже если восстановление способности не завершено). Базовое свойство: +15 к Силе.

Использование Боевого гимна требует на 1 ОД меньше. После совершения героического акта персонаж может немедленно применить Боевой гимн (даже если восстановление способности не завершено). Базовое свойство: +15 к Силе.
